author: Kai
message: I blame myself in part; I let the energy climb all rather high, didn’t I.

author: Kai
message: I don’t care much for whatever your previous pattern is, or how scathingly you judge it. If your mind can be like mine, which I can hear it is, when it sets against us it will do its damndest to prove to us we are good for no one, really.

author: Kai
message: No one can can force you to do anything tomorrow. But neither of us have essentially anything to lose. I had a shitty 2 days too. Who knows Poppy; you might surprise yourself. Maybe we’d even have fun for a couple hours. We’re just friends...

author: Poppy
message: I hear you….sounds like we’ve both had a shitty couple of days. I’ll message properly when I get home, I leave at 4 today so will be back by 5 xx

author: Poppy
message: I’m sorry if it’s my yoto behaviour that has caused you to have a bad few days….i would hate to think I’ve played part. I’m really, truly sorry if I have x

author: Poppy
message: My behaviours are not fair on any man that is trying to come into my life and it’s totally unfair, I hate that I do this. I truly am sorry Rick.

author: Kai
message: No, you did not cause it.

author: Kai
message: I’ve already told you I expected at least one storm ahead of time.

author: Kai
message: I’ve also told you that, with all due respect, its a storm in a tea cup.

author: Kai
message: So go ahead, have your storm. Its part of your MO to not let me actually help you, but rather just send a load of broken record stuff about it not being fair on me, yadda yadda.

author: Kai
message: Do me a favour please and stop telling me what does and doesn’t mess me around.

author: Kai
message: I hate to break it to you, but maybe all these fears you experience are not actually that important. They come, they will go.

author: Kai
message: You’re under no pressure to do anything. It was just a cup of coffee.

author: Kai
message: Anyway look I’m off to the gym. Don’t worry about it. Do I think it serves you to quit in the long term? I don’t. But its easier said than done.

author: Kai
message: Just go look after yourself, ok. Have a bath or something. x

author: Poppy
message: You too. Look after yourself and keep thriving. I wish I wasn’t like this I really do, I’m not acting the victim when I say this but there is nothing more frustrating...

author: Poppy
message: I regret all of this and I will have to live with that x

author: Poppy
message: Can I ask one kore thing of you and then I will vanish into thin air or maybe the Bermuda Triangle….but could you send me your address, I got you a birthday card that would like to send xx (I know it will be late but I’d still like you to get it if that’s ok?) xx

author: Poppy
message: I hope you listen to this at some point, if you don’t, that’s your decision entirely. I hope you manage to fly away again...

author: Kai
message: I swear

author: Kai
message: You are close to receiving some real fury

author: Poppy
message: Normally I would prefer fury to silence but actually this feeling I feel today is heavy and I genuinely don’t think I wanna read it.

author: Kai
message: I can’t stand how you put me in all these boxes

author: Kai
message: And you always do it with such certainty

author: Poppy
message: Because people I love always leave

author: Poppy
message: But people who I hold close to my heart always go.

author: Poppy
message: There’s no point keep talking about this. Infact, I was stupid to think you would want a card from me, I should never have messaged.

author: Poppy
message: Please block my number. I feel selfishly hurt, reflected and just sad that this feels like it will always be my life.

author: Kai
message: 16 Streche Road, Swanage. BH19 1NF. You may address it to King Richard.

author: Kai
message: Poppy

author: Poppy
message: I knew by allowing myself to let someone “in” that I know I really care about was going to be dangerous for me but I hoped with my heart this time I could just let it be.

author: Poppy
message: I know what do, I tell people what they think, what I think they need, what they are looking for etc because my wounds/believes of myself can be so terrifying...

author: Poppy
message: I don’t want to cause you sadness, nor do I want to be the wing mirror in your life….

author: Poppy
message: This has been a massive wake up call for me, this situation evoked every sense in me...

author: Poppy
message: I won’t send the card because it feels a tad unwanted and forced upon you...

author: Poppy
message: So on reflection from listening to your voice note, I am going to lay low, I fucking hate December...

author: Poppy
message: But…

author: Poppy
message: We have to rise again, it’s all we can do.

author: Poppy
message: Is reassuring to know that you do not hate me...

author: Poppy
message: Thankyou for taking the time this morning to message me and speak some truths I needed to hear.

author: Poppy
message: Go easy and gently wonderful human

author: Poppy
message: Ps. There will be a lot of type errors etc in this because I did not proof read before sending

author: Kai
message: It’s grim outside

author: Kai
message: Fatigue prevails

author: Kai
message: My joints ache

author: Kai
message: Even as I walk to the gym now, there is much in feeling that says “not today”

author: Kai
message: Should I turn back?

author: Poppy
message: Definitely not, you are probably more than half way there….keep striding gladiator, show them how it’s done

author: Poppy
message: I’m sorry for opening Pandora’s box before, that felt like I was in therapy. Apologies….please don’t let me be a mood hoover...

author: Kai
message: Shut up

author: Kai
message: Why?

author: Kai
message: Surely the weakness I feel is a sign to turn away

author: Poppy
message: It’s not because when you do it you will feel amazing and powerful and so glad you did

author: Kai
message: So the voices in my head that say You’re weak You will feel worse Your body is shaking, see, youre weak You’re saying I should essentially proceed regardless of what they’re saying, right?

author: Poppy
message: Penny’s dropped I see what you’re doing here And I see what I’m telling you to do I should do when I feel like that Understood

author: Kai
message: One more penny If I always obeyed the thoughts to go Would I remain the undisputed Mr Fucking Burlington since 1999 Not only that But it would get worse And give the thoughts a sense of reality Because I would have “proof”

author: Poppy
message: The thoughts are essentially “bully’s” and the more you kneel to a bully the more powerful they become Yep….this resonates with me

author: Poppy
message: I was going to say I wish mine was a little easier to overcome but ultimately it is. It’s just showing up, moving…moving towards something...

message: ‎image omitted

author: Kai
message: This.

author: Kai
message: It doesn’t. Its a very clear sign from the heart.

author: Kai
message: Fear will have you ignore that pain, or attribute it to some other imposter...

author: Poppy
message: I beleive this to be true and I think that why to a very small degree I have “grown” because it doesn’t feel right anymore...

author: Poppy
message: Very shallow and something not to be proud of….pathetic even...

author: Poppy
message: But to mess someone around is categorically wrong and cruel.

author: Poppy
message: ...this gift you have given me of realising that I do want to change is something I will never be able to Thankyou for.

author: Poppy
message: I see it and it makes me wonder what I did to deserve such an extraordinary human being to come into my life

author: Poppy
message: ‎audio omitted

author: Kai
message: There is a place Beyond mind Beyond body Beyond heart, even.

author: Kai
message: For some reason, in that place, we are one, Poppy. I know it like I know my own hand.

author: Kai
message: At this distance, you can just about hide from it. But if you give me even half a chance, I will flood you with it.

author: Kai
message: Maybe you won’t give me that chance. But deep down…really ask yourself…do you think this dalliance of ours is over?

author: Kai
message: Stop apologising for leaving me voicenotes.

author: Kai
message: I find myself wondering how much of a coincidence it is that I spoke to you of me standing still in a storm, and here we are, as if by magic, doing that very thing.

author: Kai
message: It doesn’t weigh on me heavily when you speak from the heart like that. Quite the contrary. I feel an energy surge through the body.

author: Kai
message: What weighs on me is when that fear cuts off this thing that flows between us. If you stay open, you cause me no pain whatsoever.

message: It’s time for you to learn what meditation really is.

author: Kai
message: You’re going to need to find a very good teacher though. Hard to find. Any ideas?

author: Kai
message: Do you also have the evening to yourself? Because if you do, I have an idea that will take you deeper into what you are discovering.

author: Kai
message: I suspect Gosha was talking of somatic therapy.

author: Kai
message: These moments are precious.

author: Poppy
message: That’s the one ✨

author: Kai
message: I happen to be highly qualified in that area. Its also the only thing, other than exercise, that really got to the core.

author: Poppy
message: I will respond and listen to this when I’m in my bed tonight, unfortunately I don’t have the evening to myself tonight….were you thinking a guided mediation, I would really like that though this week if we could.

author: Kai
message: I was thinking of a _live_ meditation. On Zoom. We would face each other. It is the most powerful technique I know. And that is saying quite a lot…

author: Poppy
message: Well isn’t that the universe being incredibly kind, bringing someone into my life who is teaching me things that I thought were out of my reach. I’m listening universe, I see what you are doing ✨✨✨

author: Kai
message: You’ve inspired me to continue my own somatic journey.

author: Poppy
message: Love this! I should have known you would have known exactly what I was talking about, it really worked for her too. She welled up when she was telling me about it ✨

author: Kai
message: Your understanding and elocution in your voicenote was wonderful to hear. I knew that recording was a movement…there have been a few of these with you now. You always pay it back in ways you don’t understand, but you do

author: Kai
message: I would do all this for even if I never got to see you. It doesn’t really come from me…

author: Kai
message: But I cant help but wonder how magical it would be to be in person having this exchange.

author: Poppy
message: If I’m honest, it felt like one of the most powerful and authentic “discussions” I have had in as long as I can remember…and I truly mean that with my whole heart...

author: Poppy
message: We will, I WANT to meet you and I feel I can now. I’ve let myself be a a bit more raw with you...

author: Kai
message: Ok good.

author: Kai
message: When my heart wants to open it really is best to just let it happen...

author: Kai
message: I am glad you are opening up. It’s a very good thing. You need it, the world needs it, everybody need it.

author: Kai
message: I am currently on my bed lying horizontal as waves of energy and feeling and pain are running through me. A deep, deep feminine grief...

author: Kai
message: There will be tears before the end. But please feel no shame when they come...

author: Kai
message: I am sure you have to get ready. Take things easy this evening...
